Title: Sandbox mode
Description:
'Just let me build' mode. Costs of all buildings, infrastructure and vehicles is reduced to zero. Each category can be turned on or off individually, check out the mod settings on new game!

Source: https://github.com/jorn86/VoxelTycoonMods
Changelog: https://github.com/jorn86/VoxelTycoonMods/blob/master/Sandbox/changelog.md

Version 0.1.2
